about_the_game:
A 3D Puzzle Platformer Rolling Ball Game in which you guide a rolling ball to the destination cube. Each level is timed and features different challenges that will require reflexes and thinking.

Roll the ball along the course platforms to get to the end!

You can customize the appearance of your rolling ball in the main menu.

This is the free demo, featuring the first 9 Levels. For the full game, check out Rolling Ball: Sphere Guider.
detailed_description:
A 3D Puzzle Platformer Rolling Ball Game in which you guide a rolling ball to the destination cube. Each level is timed and features different challenges that will require reflexes and thinking.

Roll the ball along the course platforms to get to the end!

You can customize the appearance of your rolling ball in the main menu.

This is the free demo, featuring the first 9 Levels. For the full game, check out Rolling Ball: Sphere Guider.

name: Rolling Ball : Sphere Guider Demo
short_description: Race against the clock in this Casually Difficult Rolling Ball Game!
